entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 21 February 2023
